name: Tanki vs Snakes
description:
Upgrade your skills and try to survive as much as you can and try to be the strongest tank. You start as a weak tank and try to get stronger with battle others who are trying to do the same. How long can you survive?
Tanki has no lag issues, performance problems and also have controls designed for every mobile device.

Some of the main features:

- Upgrade your tank to 60 levels
- Use many kinds of weapons
- No Lag. No performance issues on any device
- Smooth gameplay with mobile controls with joystick
- Internet connection is not needed, play wherever, you are offline or online
- Play with bots
- All this for free

Now it is your turn to download the super battle game! Enjoy super cool moments with Diep Tanks Real War: it’s all free and never ending fun moments at your fingertips.
